title: Topic 001 Question 107
body: A bicycle sharing company is developing a multi-tier architecture to track the location of its bicycles during peak operating hours. The company wants to use these data points in its existing analytics platform. A solutions architect must determine the most viable multi-tier option to support this architecture. The data points must be accessible from the REST API.
Which action meets these requirements for storing and retrieving location data?
options: Use Amazon Athena with Amazon S3.
Use Amazon API Gateway with AWS Lambda.
Use Amazon QuickSight with Amazon Redshift.
Use Amazon API Gateway with Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics.
